name: Virizion EX
author: Ryo Ueda

abilities.name: Verdant Wind
abilities.effect: Each of your Pokémon that has any {G} Energy attached to it can’t be affected by any Special Conditions. (Remove any Special Conditions affecting those Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Emerald Slash
attacks.effect: You may search your deck for 2 {G} Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

rule_box: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
